data.text: Ao, Onyankopɔn, gye me nkwa
Meremem wɔ dontori a mu dɔ mu,
Mafrɛ abrɛ rehwehwɛ mmoa.
Wɔn a wɔtan me kwa no
Wo, Onyankopɔn, nim me nkwaseasɛm;
Awurade, Awurade Tweduampɔn,
Wo nti migyina animka ano,
Mete sɛ ɔhɔho wɔ me nuanom mu,
na wo fi ho mmɔdemmɔ hyɛ me so,
Sɛ mitwa adwo na midi mmuada a
sɛ mifura atweaatam a
Wɔn a wɔtete ɔpon no ano no serew me,
Nanso mɛbɔ wo mpae, Awurade,
Yi me fi dontori no mu,
Mma nsu nnyiri mmfa me
Awurade, gye me so fi wʼadɔe a eye no mu;
Mfa wʼanim nhintaw wo somfo;
Twiw bɛn me na gye me;
Wunim sɛnea wɔkasa tia me, gu mʼanim ase na wotiatia mʼanim;
Kasatia ahyɛ me koma so
Wɔde bɔnwoma guu mʼaduan mu,
Ma wɔn didipon a esi wɔn anim nyi wɔn sɛ afiri;
Ma wɔn ani so nyɛ wɔn kusuu na wɔanhu ade,
Hwie wʼabufuwhyew gu wɔn so;
Ma wɔn fi nyɛ amamfo;
Wɔtaa wɔn a wupira wɔn no,
Fa amumɔyɛ mu amumɔyɛ ho sobo bɔ wɔn;
Pepa wɔn din fi nkwa nhoma no mu,
Mewɔ ɔyaw ne ahohiahia mu;
Mede dwonto beyi Onyankopɔn din ayɛ
Eyi bɛsɔ Awurade ani yiye asen nantwi,
Mmɔborɔni behu na nʼani agye,
Awurade tie wɔn a ade ahia wɔn,
Ma ɔsoro ne asase nkamfo no,
efisɛ Onyankopɔn begye Sion nkwa
Nʼasomfo asefo na wɔbɛfa hɔ,
